ygData.subject: Re: Robe
ygData.msgSnippet: ... It gives you a little bit more mana (+1 is not a lot).  It s also great AC, and it looks good.  The different cities have different colors so people can
ygData.messageBody:
> Just bought the "senior apprentice" robe, with +1 mana.
> Does anyone know
> what this does? I mean does it give you more mana, or do
> you regenerate it
> faster? Thanks for any info.

It gives you a little bit more mana (+1 is not a lot). It's also
great AC, and it looks good. The different cities have different
colors so people can see where you are from. Erudin ones are red,
Freeport purple, etc.

Aznyin
Level 14 Erudite Wizard
Chivalric Order of Norrath
Current Residence: Rivervale [Solusek Ro]
